original_title: Patamorphose ou le Désespoir du peintre
overview: In front of his easel installed on a terrace in the Luxembourg garden, an amateur painter is at work. His goal: to reproduce the Luxembourg Palace on his canvas. But this is easier said than done and to tame his brush and his reticent colors, he sets out to represent his subject in twenty different ways, using the different technical procedures used in animated films.
title: Patamorphose ou le Désespoir du peintre
